long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lute is a wallet built specifically for the Algorand blockchain that allows users to manage their accounts, connect to dApps, and sign transactions.

Lute supports:

• Ledger hardware wallets
• HD wallets
• Multi-Sig accounts
• Alternate AVM chains (Voi)
• Asset Inbox (send & receive assets without opt-in)

The Lute Wallet browser extension works just like the web wallet (lute.app), but is delivered more securely through the Web Store.
